name: xpindi
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wceq(cxp(c0, cin(c1, c2)), cin(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c2)))

stmt.origin: eqtr2i(cxp(c0, cin(c1, c2)), cin(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c2)), cxp(cin(c0, c0), cin(c1, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cxp(c0, cin(c1, c2)), cin(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c2)))
-| wceq(cin(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c2)), cxp(cin(c0, c0), cin(c1, c2)))
-| wceq(cxp(cin(c0, c0), cin(c1, c2)), cxp(c0, cin(c1, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cxp(c0, cin(c1, c2)), cin(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c2)))

body.origin: |- wceq(cin(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c2)), cxp(cin(c0, c0), cin(c1, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cxp(c0, cin(c1, c2)), cin(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c2)))
-| wceq(cxp(cin(c0, c0), cin(c1, c2)), cxp(c0, cin(c1, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cxp(cin(c0, c0), cin(c1, c2)), cxp(c0, cin(c1, c2)))
-| wceq(cin(c0, c0), c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cxp(c0, cin(c1, c2)), cin(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c2)))
-| wceq(cin(c0, c0), c0)
|- wceq(cxp(c0, cin(c1, c2)), cin(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c2)))

comment: Distributive law for Cartesian product over intersection. Theorem 102 of [Suppes] p. 52. (Contributed by NM, 26-Sep-2004.)
